verses.verse: (A Psalm of Asaph.) The Mighty <S%H410><s%> One, <S%H410><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> has spoken, <S%H1696><s%> And summoned <S%H7121><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> from the rising <S%H4217><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%> to its setting. <S%H3996><s%>
Out of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> the perfection <S%H4359><s%> of beauty, <S%H3308><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has shone <S%H3313><s%> forth. <S%H3313><s%>

May our God <S%H430><s%> come <S%H935><s%> and not keep <S%H2790><s%> silence; <S%H2790><s%> Fire <S%H784><s%> devours <S%H398><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Him, And it is very <S%H3966><s%> tempestuous <S%H9621><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> Him.
He summons <S%H7121><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> above, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> And the earth, <S%H776><s%> to judge <S%H1777><s%> His people: <S%H5971><s%>
"Gather <S%H622><s%> My godly <S%H2623><s%> ones <S%H2623><s%> to Me, Those who have made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Me by sacrifice. <S%H2077><s%>"
And the heavens <S%H8064><s%> declare <S%H5046><s%> His righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> For God <S%H430><s%> Himself <S%H1931><s%> is judge. <S%H8199><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
"Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O My people, <S%H5971><s%> and I will speak; <S%H1696><s%> O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> I will testify <S%H5749><s%> against you; I am God, <S%H430><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
"I do not reprove <S%H3198><s%> you for your sacrifices, <S%H2077><s%> And your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings <S%H5930><s%> are continually <S%H8548><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> Me.
"I shall take <S%H3947><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> young <S%H6499><s%> bull <S%H6499><s%> out of your house, <S%H1004><s%> Nor male <S%H6260><s%> goats <S%H6260><s%> out of your folds. <S%H4356><s%>
"For every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H9130><s%> of the forest <S%H9194><s%> is Mine, The cattle <S%H929><s%> on a thousand <S%H505><s%> hills. <S%H2022><s%>
"I know <S%H3045><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> bird <S%H5775><s%> of the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> And everything <S%H2123><s%> that moves <S%H2123><s%> in the field <S%H9583><s%> is Mine. <S%H5973><s%>
"If <S%H518><s%> I were hungry, <S%H7456><s%> I would not tell <S%H559><s%> you; For the world <S%H8398><s%> is Mine, and all <S%H4393><s%> it contains. <S%H4393><s%>
"Shall I eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of bulls, <S%H47><s%> Or drink <S%H8354><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of male <S%H6260><s%> goats <S%H6260><s%>?
"Offer <S%H2076><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> a sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> of thanksgiving, <S%H8426><s%> And pay <S%H9608><s%> your vows <S%H5088><s%> to the Most <S%H9411><s%> High; <S%H9411><s%>
And call <S%H7121><s%> upon Me in the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble; <S%H6869><s%> I shall rescue <S%H2502><s%> you, and you will honor <S%H3513><s%> Me. "

But to the wicked <S%H7563><s%> God <S%H430><s%> says, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> right have you to tell <S%H5608><s%> of My statutes, <S%H2706><s%> And to take <S%H5375><s%> My covenant <S%H1285><s%> in your mouth <S%H6310><s%>?
"For you hate <S%H8130><s%> discipline, <S%H4148><s%> And you cast <S%H7993><s%> My words <S%H1697><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> you.
"When <S%H518><s%> you see <S%H7200><s%> a thief, <S%H1590><s%> you are pleased <S%H7521><s%> with him, And you associate <S%H2506><s%> with adulterers. <S%H5003><s%>
"You let <S%H7971><s%> your mouth <S%H6310><s%> loose <S%H7971><s%> in evil, <S%H9567><s%> And your tongue <S%H3956><s%> frames <S%H6775><s%> deceit. <S%H4820><s%>
"You sit <S%H3427><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> against your brother; <S%H251><s%> You slander <S%H5414><s%> <S%H1848><s%> your own mother's son. <S%H1121><s%>

"These <S%H428><s%> things <S%H428><s%> you have done, <S%H6213><s%> and I kept <S%H2790><s%> silence; <S%H2790><s%> You thought <S%H1819><s%> that I was just like <S%H3644><s%> you; I will reprove <S%H3198><s%> you, and state <S%H6186><s%> [the case] in order <S%H6186><s%> before your eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

"Now <S%H4994><s%> consider <S%H995><s%> this, <S%H384><s%> you who forget <S%H7911><s%> God, <S%H433><s%> Lest <S%H6435><s%> I tear <S%H2963><s%> [you] in pieces, and there <S%H369><s%> be none <S%H369><s%> to deliver. <S%H5337><s%>

"He who offers <S%H2076><s%> a sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> honors <S%H3513><s%> Me; And to him who orders <S%H7760><s%> [his] way <S%H1870><s%> [aright] I shall show <S%H7200><s%> the salvation <S%H3468><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>"
